body_html:
@taion, you will first see the effect of these changes on the nightly* docker images that we build and push onto Docker Hub every night. Currently there are some blockers that prevent the nightly-gpu* images to be built successfully. But the non-gpu ones should already be 16.04.
https://hub.docker.com/r/tensorflow/tensorflow/tags/

The next TF release (1.1) will incorporate these changes.
